Name: High Stomp
Description: Stomp on an enemy from above.

Name: Focus
Description: Increases your attack power for your next attack by 2.
Infinite Stacking: `+<var,2> attack

Name: Multistomp
Description: Stomp on all enemies in a row.
Infinite Stacking: Does stomp + <var,2,-2> damage

Name: Electro Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy with electric element. Ignores all contact hazards. (Air/Electric damage pierces defense except for specifically air/electric defense.)
L2 Description: Bonus damage based on target defense. Inflicts Defense Down 2 for 3 turns
Infinite Stacking: Bonus damage based on target defense. Inflicts Defense Down <var,2,-2> for 3 turns. Does stomp + <var,2,-4> base damage.

Name: Taunt
Description: Makes all enemies berserk and makes them target the user.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of Berserk.

Name: Paralyze Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy with electric element and paralyze it. Ignores all contact hazards. Paralyzing an enemy will halve its attack power.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of Paralyze.

Name: Flame Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy with flame element. (Fire damage gets boosted up to +1.0x based on how low your HP percentage is.)
L2 Description: Inflicts Sunder 3 at the end of your turn.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts Sunder <var,1,2> at the end of your turn. Base damage is stomp + <var,2>

Name: Double Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy twice. Base hit is stomp + 1. Second hit is 0.75x as strong.
L2 Description: Hits 3 times, but 3rd hit is x0.75 of the 2nd hit.
Infinite Stacking: Hits <var,1,1> times, but each hit is 0.75x as strong as the last hit.

Name: Overstomp
Description: Stomp an enemy a little too hard. (Deals recoil damage equal to base stomp power)
Infinite Stacking: Damage dealt is stomp + <var,5,7>, recoil damage is stomp + <var,3,-3>

Name: Smart Stomp
Description: Stomp on an enemy and inflict the status they are weakest to. (Highest turn count, but only tries to inflict statuses that the enemy is currently susceptible to.)
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of status.

Name: Team Quake
Description: (Requires Luna) Deals massive damage to all grounded enemies 3 times. Each subsequent hit is 0.75x as strong.
Infinite Stacking: Hits <var,2,1> times.

Name: Egg Toss
Description: Lay an egg and use it immediately (either throwing it at an enemy or using it on yourself.)
Infinite Stacking: Lay <var,1> eggs.

Name: Slash
Description: Slash an enemy. Pierces 1 defense. (Defense is treated as if it was lowered by 1, if defense is at least 1)

Name: Multislash
Description: Slash an enemy with multiple times. Hits twice, first hit is base sword damage + 1
Infinite Stacking: <var,2> hits.

Name: Slip Slash
Description: Slip past grounded enemies to hit a target behind them. Deals damage to enemies that get passed.
L2 Description: Does 1 more to passed enemies, 2 more to the target.
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,1,-3> damage to passed enemies, slash + <var,1,-1> to the target.

Name: Poison Slash
Description: Slash an enemy and inflict Poison.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of Poison.

Name: Precise Stab
Description: Stab an enemy with water element. (Water damage is stronger when the user is at high HP, up to a +0.66x boost.)
L2 Description: Element damage formula changes: Damage boosting is based on the whole party's average HP percentage.
Infinite Stacking: Element damage formula changes: Damage boosting is based on the whole party's average HP percentage. Base damage is slash + <var,2,3>.

Name: Sword Discharge
Description: Shoot a lightning bolt that can hit any position. (Air/Electric damage pierces defense.)
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,4,-1> base damage.

Name: Sword Dance
Description: A special dance that can hit any grounded enemy and preserves Focus (Focus is not lost after this attack.) Also switches your position around.
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,3,-3> base damage and gives you <var,2> Focus.

Name: Boomerang Slash
Description: Throw your sword out to hit any position. Hits twice. Returning hit is stronger.
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,2,-2> damage on the first hit, <var,2,-1> on the second hit.

Name: Dark Slash
Description: Slash an enemy with dark element. (Dark type damage is stronger against enemies at low hp, up to a +1.0x boost.)
L2 Description: Element damage formula changes: Bonus damage based on delta hp percentages.
Infinite Stacking: Element damage formula changes: Bonus damage based on delta hp percentages. Does slash + <var,3,3> base damage.

Name: Aetherize
Description: Become ethereal for 1 turn, preventing most attacks from hitting you. (Also costs an extra action to all targets)
L3 Description: Targets both, does not inflict Cooldown.
Infinite Stacking: Targets both, does not inflict Cooldown. Gives you <var,1,-3> turns of Ethereal.

Name: Flame Bat
Description: Launch a flaming ball that can hit any position. Refunds your turn if it hits and action command is successful. Action command difficulty increases the more actions you have taken. (Fire damage gets boosted up to 1.0x based on how low your HP percentage is.)
Infinite Stacking: Does ceil(slash/2) + <var,2,-2> base damage.

Name: Astral Wall
Description: Protects you from losing more than 25% of your max hp of damage in a single turn. Failed action command results it in getting capped at half max HP instead. Gets removed at the end of turn if damage is capped.
L3 Description: Targets both, applies Astral Recovery for 3 turns
Infinite Stacking: Targets both, applies the effect and Astral Recovery for <var,1> turns. Protects you from losing up to (1 / <var,1,1>) of your Max HP.
